ygData.subject: Starting a New Cleric Suggestions Please
ygData.msgSnippet: I am going to move to the Race war server. If I had a choice I would play a High Elf Cleric. Which I play on Rallos Zek and Love, Lots of Manna. However all my
ygData.messageBody:
I am going to move to the Race war server. If I had a choice I would play a
High Elf Cleric. Which I play on Rallos Zek and Love, Lots of Manna.

However all my friends want to be on the human team. Barbarian, Erudite or
Human.
So any ideas on what is best to pick and your reasons. Obviously the choices
are Erudite or Human.

The Erudite has more Wisdom

Str Sta Ag Dx W Int Ch
65 75 70 70 93 105 70 +30

but the Human is a better all rounder

Str Sta Ag Dx W Int Ch
80 80 75 75 85 75 75 +30


I looking for people with high level Clerics 20 plus as I do not want figure
out I've made a mistake later.


Thanks

Chasman
